attributes.action: Make all MP's who change from one party to another, have to have a bi-election.
attributes.additional_details: With our party system MP's are voted in as they are part of a party system, if they now change the party they support, they should go for re-election.
attributes.background: MP's who change party mid term, have to resit their seat.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
